Welcome

Welcome to my website! My name is Maxwell McNeal. I am an avid data scientist, specializing in web scraping, data visualization, and sports analytics. This website is a place for me to share my work with the world and show people what I'm up to. I'm also a proud UCLA graduate, go Bruins!
